analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ApplauseCashCrowdsale.finaliseCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0xe07e687dc4b244d574f37490948c7f4aa921d958.sol#709-713):
	External calls:
	- vault.close() (/unique_contracts/0xe07e687dc4b244d574f37490948c7f4aa921d958.sol#711)
	- vault.enableRefunds() (/unique_contracts/0xe07e687dc4b244d574f37490948c7f4aa921d958.sol#712)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_contracts/0xe07e687dc4b244d574f37490948c7f4aa921d958.sol#712-713)

ApplauseCashCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0xe07e687dc4b244d574f37490948c7f4aa921d958.sol#512-543) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,bonusedTokens) (/unique_contracts/0xe07e687dc4b244d574f37490948c7f4aa921d958.sol#539-540)

ApplauseCashCrowdsale.transferTokens (/unique_contracts/0xe07e687dc4b244d574f37490948c7f4aa921d958.sol#544-547) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0xe07e687dc4b244d574f37490948c7f4aa921d958.sol#546-547)

ApplauseCashToken.INITIAL_SUPPLY should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xe07e687dc4b244d574f37490948c7f4aa921d958.sol#363)
Deployer.multisig should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xe07e687dc4b244d574f37490948c7f4aa921d958.sol#716-718)
